headline: Does Halliburton’s Recent Share Price Recovery Still Offer Attractive Value in 2025?
summary: Wondering if Halliburton is still a smart energy play at today’s price, or if most of the upside is already baked in? This breakdown will help you decide whether the stock offers real value or just headline appeal. The share price has been choppy lately, down 0.8% over the last week but still up 9.2% in the past month, with a 10.5% gain over the last year and 63.3% over five years, which hints at both recovery and remaining volatility after a 22.8% drop over three years. Behind those moves,...

headline: Halliburton (HAL): Reassessing Valuation After Q3 Outperformance, Cost Controls and the VoltaGrid Data Center Power Push
summary: Halliburton (HAL) is back on investor radar after a strong Q3 showing, tighter cost controls, and growing buzz around its VoltaGrid partnership, a deal that ties traditional energy expertise to future data center power demand. See our latest analysis for Halliburton. Despite some short term noise, Halliburton’s 9.18 percent 1 month share price return and 16.15 percent 3 month share price return suggest momentum is quietly rebuilding, even as the 10.54 percent 1 year total shareholder return...
